author: pburba
msg: Follow-up to r39837 and r39865, simplify the use of a wc-1 to wc-ng
(calculate_remaining_ranges): Don't attempt to warn about merges from a
node's future history when that node can't have a future history.  Also
correct some documentation and fix some trailing whitespace.

author: rhuijben
msg: Switch a few svn_uri_*() calls in libsvn_ra_neon to their
commit_open_file): Use relpath api instead of uris.

author: julianfoad
msg: Correct an error code returned by the Gnome keyring authn module.
(ssl_client_cert_pw_gnome_keyring_save_creds): As this function is for saving
creds, use the *_NOT_SAVED error code rather than *_UNAVAILABLE.

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r39876 and more, switch more cases to the right
svn_dirent/uri/relpath api for their task. Removing a few obsolete
Use relpath for components and uri for the complete path.

author: danielsh
msg: In FSFS, write the rep-cache DB entries outside the write lock.  See r39892
and the thread referenced there for details.  This is part of issue #3506.
Always call commit_body().  If REP_SHARING_ALLOWED, then do (outside
the write lock) what commit_body_rep_cache() used to do.
Add a TODO that opening the rep-cache DB should not be treated as
